msbt.message: Are you here to soak in all the fabulous art as well? I could spend hours here myself. I find it soothing to be around so much sophistication and culture, .

It's so quiet and calming here among the artwhich makes it an excellent place to get lost in thought. Yes, contemplating all this gorgeous artis just so very zzzzzzz <10_10 />CUBISM!!<10_9 /> Wait, whatwhere am I?Ah, of course. I'm at the museum. Don't mind me, darling. Happens all the time.

When I walk into this exhibit, I can't help but become totally enamored with each piece of art I see! It's as if I get pulled into each painting I look atand transform into each statue I lay eyes upon It's like I keep telling Blathersâ€” I can't help it if I'm an extreme art enthusiast, .

How do you find 's art collection? Have you discovered any pieces that truly speak to you? Well, I certainly hope the experience has been worth the journey you took to get here. I want you to say all kinds of wonderful things about us when you return home, !

To come all the way here and visit our museumwhy, you must be a true art connoisseur! I, too, am quite the art aficionado, you know.Expressionism, impressionism, neoclassicismI love ALL the isms, darling.

Isn't it lovely how calm and quiet it is in here, ?I do love coming to the museum to peruse all the fabulous artworkBut to be honest, sometimes I come here just to get away from all the island hubbub.

I'm so very grateful to have a place to go where I can luxuriate in all manner of fine art. Standing here and taking it all in I feel so relaxed and at peace with the world. I know, darling! Rather than call it an "art exhibit," we should call it an "art spa"!
My dear, I must say, having an art exhibit like thiswhy, it makes the whole island feel more sophisticated!
Our little island has a variety of fabulous facilities, but this art exhibit must be my favorite. But don't go telling Blathers I said that. I wouldn't want him to get a big head about it, .
